member.summary: Determines the zoom level from which the tiles should be gotten.

Screen rectangle used for zoom level calculation.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.GroundResolution(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the ground resolution (in meters per pixel) at a specified latitude and level of detail.
member.param: Latitude (in degrees) at which to measure the ground resolution.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
member.returns: The ground resolution, in meters per pixel.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.LatLongToPixelXy(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a point from latitude/longitude WGS-84 coordinates (in degrees) into pixel XY coordinates at a specified level of detail.
member.param: Latitude of the point, in degrees.
Longitude of the point, in degrees.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.LatLongToPixelXy(GeoAPI.Geometries.Coordinate,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a point from latitude/longitude WGS-84 coordinates (in degrees) into pixel XY coordinates at a specified level of detail.
member.param: Latitude, Longitude Coordinate of the point, in degrees.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.LatLongToTileXy(GeoAPI.Geometries.Coordinate,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a WGS-84 Lat/Long coordinate to the tile XY of the tile containing that point at the given levelOfDetail.
member.param: Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.MapScale(System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the map scale at a specified latitude, level of detail, and screen resolution.
member.param: Latitude (in degrees) at which to measure the map scale.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
Resolution of the screen, in dots per inch.
member.returns: The map scale, expressed as the denominator N of the ratio 1 : N.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.MapSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the map width and height (in pixels) at a specified level of detail.
member.param: Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
member.returns: The map width and height in pixels.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.PixelXyToLatLong(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a pixel from pixel XY coordinates at a specified level of detail into latitude/longitude WGS-84 coordinates (in degrees).
member.param: X coordinate of the point, in pixels.
Y coordinates of the point, in pixels.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.PixelXyToTileXy(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts pixel XY coordinates into tile XY coordinates of the tile containing the specified pixel.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.PixelXyToTileXy(NetTopologySuite.Geometries.Point)
member.summary: Converts pixel XY coordinates into tile XY coordinates of the tile containing the specified pixel.

member.summary: Takes a 2-dimensional array of tiles and stitches it into a single Bitmap for display on the Map.
member.returns: Bitmap of the tiles stitched together

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.TileXyToBingQuadKey(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts tile XY coordinates into a QuadKey at a specified level of detail.
member.param: Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
member.returns: A string containing the Bing QuadKey.

member.name: M:DotSpatial.Plugins.WebMap.Tiling.TileCalculator.TileXyToBottomRightPixelXy(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts tile XY coordinates into pixel XY coordinates of the bottom-right pixel of the specified tile.
member.returns: The coordinate of the bottom-right pixel of the tile.

member.summary: Converts tile XY coordinates into pixel XY coordinates of the upper-left pixel of the specified tile.
